name: EJBCA Community
description: The open-source public key infrastructure (PKI) and certificate authority (CA) software EJBCA is one of the longest running CA software projects. EJBCA covers all your needs - from certificate enrollment, via certificate management, to certificate validation.
tagline: The open-source public key infrastructure (PKI) and certificate authority (CA)
author: BigBearCommunity

before_install.en_us:
After installation wait for a few minutes as the initialization takes a while.
Default admin URL: https://<host/ip>:8443/ejbca/adminweb
Default HTTP port: 8080
For more information on custom setup visit: https://github.com/Keyfactor/ejbca-ce
